data.name: Triangle Properties
data.description:
You are given a set of coordinates representing a triangle.
Your task is to determine properties of the triangle and return a 2-letter string describing triangle's properties.

Angle properties:

- "R" - [Right Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Right_triangle) - contains a right angle (90°)
- "A" - [Acute Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acute_and_obtuse_triangles) - all angles are less than 90°
- "O" - [Obtuse Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acute_and_obtuse_triangles) - at least one angle is obtuse

Edge properties:

- "E" - [Equilateral Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equilateral_triangle) - all sides have the same lengths
- "I" - [Isosceles Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isosceles_triangle) - two sides have equal lengths
- "S" - [Scalene Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triangle) - all sides have different lengths

Example:

![Sample triangle](http://www.mathexpression.com/images/points-on-graphs.png)

Triangle with coordinates == {{1,3},{-2,1},{4,2}} should return "OS" or "SO".
